hero.title: Terms & Conditions
hero.subtitle: Please find below the latest Alium terms and conditions (“Terms”).

By creating an account, or by using or visiting our Website, you are bound to these Terms and you indicate your continued acceptance of them.

All prices are exclusive of taxes, duties, levies, or fees imposed by any taxing authority other than Alium’s income tax, unless you provide an appropriate resale or exemption certificate for the delivery location.
